'''''The Shimmering Voyage Vol. 4''''' is the Version 4.0 Commemorative [[soundtrack]] album.

It features  tracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team. The album is divided into 3 discs: ''Summertime Excursion'', ''Romance Without Words'', and ''Curiosites Esthetiques''.

The album was first announced on July 05, 2024, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 4.8]]. The album was later released on July 31.<ref>Weibo: [https://weibo.com/6593199887/Oq5njcEL8 {{zh|《原神》4.0回顾主题OST《珍珠之歌4》正式上线。}}]</ref>
